<small>Aramaic form: [[H6744]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלַח‎</span>] **verb** ==rush==; — ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְלַח‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***cleave, penetrate***, then ***advance***, see following); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצָֽלְחָה‎</span> consecutive [[1Sam.10.6|1Sam 10:6]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽלְחוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.18|2Sam 19:18]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְלַח‎</span> [[Amos.5.6|Amos 5:6]] (see below), 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּצְלַח‎</span> [[Judg.14.6|Judg 14:6]] +; — ***rush***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיַּרְדֵּן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.18|2Sam 19:18]] ***they rushed into the Jordan*** (dubious, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּאֵשׁ בֵּית יוֺסֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצ‎</span> [[Amos.5.6|Amos 5:6]] lest ***he rush like fire upon the house of Joseph*** (or ***O house***, etc. [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]; [[BDB#Now|Now]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצִּית בָּאֵשׁ‎</span>); especially of sudden possession by (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱהִֹים‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ י‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ עַל‎</span>, with person [[Judg.14.6|Judg 14:6]] the Spirit . . . ***rushed upon him, so v[[Judg.14.19|Judg 14:19]]; [[Judg.15.14|Judg 15:14]]; [[1Sam.10.6|1Sam 10:6]]; [[1Sam.10.10|1Sam 10:10]]; [[1Sam.11.6|1Sam 11:6]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [[1Sam.16.13|1Sam 16:13]] and (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ צ‎</span>) [[1Sam.18.10|1Sam 18:10]]. ***



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלֵחַ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלַח‎</span>] **verb** ==advance, prosper== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician Pi\`el causative in proper name; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be good condition***, compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תצלךְ‎</span> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>93</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְלַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***prosper*** ); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלֵ֑חָה‎</span> [[Jer.12.1|Jer 12:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְלַח‎</span> [[Jer.13.7|Jer 13:7]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְלַח‎</span>; — ***prosper***, of way of wicked [[Jer.12.1|Jer 12:1]] compare [[Num.14.41|Num 14:41]]; [[Isa.53.10|Isa 53:10]]; [[Isa.54.17|Isa 54:17]]; [[Ezek.17.9|Ezek 17:9]]; [[Ezek.17.10|Ezek 17:10]]; [[Dan.11.27|Dan 11:27]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing, = ***be good for*** anything [[Jer.13.7|Jer 13:7]]; [[Jer.13.10|Jer 13:10]]; [[Ezek.15.4|Ezek 15:4]] subject person, absolute, [[Jer.22.30|Jer 22:30]]; [[Jer.22.20|Jer 22:20]]; [[Ezek.17.15|Ezek 17:15]]; [[Ps.45.5|Ps 45:5]] ***be successful !*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּצְלְחִי לִמְלוּבָה‎</span> [[Ezek.16.13|Ezek 16:13]] ***and thou didst prosper to royalty*** (dubious; strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy; &gt;[[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW vi (1886), 337 f.</sup> [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְלָאכָה‎</span> i.e. harlotry). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצְלִיחַ‎</span> [[Gen.24.21|Gen 24:21]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִצְלַחְתָּ֫‎</span> [[1Chr.22.11|1Chr 22:11]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצְלִיחַ‎</span> [[Neh.2.20|Neh 2:20]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּצְלַח‎</span> [[1Chr.29.23|1Chr 29:23]]; [[2Chr.32.30|2Chr 32:30]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצְלַח‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.12|1Kgs 22:12]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצְלִ֫יחָה‎</span> [[Neh.1.11|Neh 1:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִ֯חָ֫ה‎</span> [[Ps.118.25|Ps 118:25]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצְלִיחַ‎</span> [[Gen.24.42|Gen 24:42]] +; — 

**1.** ***make prosperous, bring to successful issue***, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with accusative of man's way (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span>), [[Gen.24.21|Gen 24:21]]; [[Gen.24.40|Gen 24:40]]; [[Gen.24.42|Gen 24:42]]; [[Gen.24.56|Gen 24:56]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), with accusative of thing [[Gen.39.3|Gen 39:3]]; [[Gen.39.23|Gen 39:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), with accusative of person [[2Chr.26.5|2Chr 26:5]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Neh.1.11|Neh 1:11]]; [[Neh.2.20|Neh 2:20]] absolute ***send success*** [[Ps.118.25|Ps 118:25]] human subject with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]]; [[Josh.1.8|Josh 1:8]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Isa.48.15|Isa 48:15]]; [[Ps.37.7|Ps 37:7]], so probably [[Ps.1.3|Ps 1:3]] (al. below **2**), [[2Chr.7.11|2Chr 7:11]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְמָה‎</span> [[Dan.8.25|Dan 8:25]]. 

**2.** ***shew, experience, prosperity***, of men [[1Kgs.22.12|1Kgs 22:12]]; [[1Kgs.22.15|1Kgs 22:15]] = [[2Chr.18.11|2Chr 18:11]]; [[2Chr.18.14|2Chr 18:14]]; [[Jer.2.37|Jer 2:37]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person in reference to whom) [[Jer.5.28|Jer 5:28]]; [[Jer.32.5|Jer 32:5]]; [[1Chr.22.11|1Chr 22:11]]; [[1Chr.22.13|1Chr 22:13]]; [[1Chr.29.23|1Chr 29:23]]; [[2Chr.13.12|2Chr 13:12]]; [[2Chr.14.6|2Chr 14:6]]; [[2Chr.20.20|2Chr 20:20]]; [[2Chr.24.20|2Chr 24:20]]; [[2Chr.31.21|2Chr 31:21]]; [[2Chr.32.30|2Chr 32:30]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָלמַֿעֲשֵׂהוּ‎</span>), [[Prov.28.13|Prov 28:13]]; [[Dan.8.12|Dan 8:12]] (of horn), v[[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]]; [[Dan.11.36|Dan 11:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מַצְלִיחַ‎</span> [[Gen.39.2|Gen 39:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***a prosperous man***; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> [[Judg.18.5|Judg 18:5]] (compare [[Ps.1.3|Ps 1:3]] above), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s word [[Isa.55.11|Isa 55:11]].
